about me

hello! my name is lev and i'm a data scientist and photographer.

my pronouns are they/them.

i live in glasgow, scotland.

i work as an information analyst for Public Health Scotland, doing data analysis and helping to publish national statistics about drug misuse in Scotland.

in my free time, i love coding, gaming, and weaving.

to get in touch, catch me on LinkedIn or Twitter. :)
